attributes.action: An extra bank holiday after the pandemic for missed celebrations.
attributes.additional_details: People could celebrate those missed birthday get togethers. It would give the country a wellbeing boost.
attributes.background: I would like the country to have an extra bank holiday after the pandemic for people to have the opportunity to catch up on missed celebrations. People could celebrate those missed birthday get togethers, and it would give the country a wellbeing boost.
